DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of their health state today as related to their usual activities (work, study, housework, family, or leisure activities), using a 3 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Questionnaire Domain European Quality of Life Five Dimension Three Level Questionnaire Usual Activities Today Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire._A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 3 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient._A question about an individual's current ability to do their usual activities._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire.

Property.preferredName: European Quality of Life Five Dimension Three Level Questionnaire Usual Activities Today Status
Property.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 3 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient.:A question about an individual's current ability to do their usual activities.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.longName: European Quality of Life Five Dimension Three Level Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 3 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient.
A question about an individual's current ability to do their usual activities.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CDSIC aligned NCI Standard CRFs. wz

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A three point ordered reference standard that describes current health state related to usual activity using the EQ-5D-3L questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.value: I am unable to perform my usual activities

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is unable to perform their usual activities.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is unable to perform their usual activities.

PermissibleValues.value: I have no problems with performing my usual activities

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no problems with performing their usual activities.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had no problems with performing their usual activities.

PermissibleValues.value: I have some problems with performing my usual activities

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had some problems with performing their usual activities.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had some problems with performing their usual activities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.origin: EQ-5D-3L:EuroQol Group, 5 Dimension, 3 Level, Health Questionnaire Version 1.0, Sample English Version for the UK, 1990
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for PRO-HRQoL as part of the Round 6 CRF Data Collection Standards. mc 2/11/2015

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Questionnaire EQ-5D-3L Test Code Terminology
ReferenceDocuments.description: Test codes of questionnaire questions associated with the EuroQOL (European Quality of Life) Five Dimension three level scale (EQ-5D-3L) for the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Standard Data Tabulation Model (SDTM).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 4716931  from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
